params.name: query
params.description: Required. Query for matching Tweets. Up to 512 characters.

params.name: start_time
params.description: The oldest UTC timestamp (from most recent 7 days) from which the Tweets will be provided. YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ (ISO 8601/RFC 3339).

params.name: end_time
params.description: The newest, most recent UTC timestamp to which the Tweets will be provided. YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ (ISO 8601/RFC 3339).

params.name: since_id
params.description: Returns results with a Tweet ID greater than (that is, more recent than) the specified ID. The ID specified is exclusive and responses will not include it.

params.name: until_id
params.description: Returns results with a Tweet ID less than (that is, older than) the specified ID. The ID specified is exclusive and responses will not include it.

params.name: max_results
params.description: The maximum number of search results to be returned by a request. A number between 10 and the system limit (currently 100). By default, a request response will return 10 results.

params.name: next_token
params.description: This parameter is used to get the next 'page' of results. The value used with the parameter is pulled directly from the response provided by the API, and should not be modified.
